ygData.messageBody:
Valuable info, David, thank you very much. Your equipment timeline is right
in line with what I had planned. At 10th level I had to decide whether to
beef up my armor to banded from patchwork & leather, or if I should save all
the loot for a level and get a combine longsword. Our general consensus in
this mailing list seemed to indicate that, since I already have a decent
weapon _for my level_ that I should get better armor now, then upgrade my
weapon later.

This latest thread helps me immensely in determining _how_ much later. If I
understand correctly, I should keep adding banded at 11th and 12th level
while making do with my mino axe, then once I have a full set of banded,
anytime between 12th and 16th should be when I need to change my primary
weapon to an upgraded magical one.

By the way, I have been working at bringing up my 1h blunt - raised it from
32 to 42 last night, plan on topping it off this weekend. My 2H blunt is
around 8 or 9, so I'm just letting it sit until I get 1h blunt to my level
cap. As for the summoned dagger/fang, it uses piercing which I have *never*
seen go up.

I'm looking forward to other Paladin's experiences as well - the greatest
wisdom in the world comes from learning from another's experiences...

Kaladin, student driver Paladin (11th and learning fast!)
